titles.en: The Book of Outfits and the Beautification and the Magnanimity
Chapter 25 – The Yemeni Onyx and the Crystals

titles.ar: كتاب الزِّيِّ وَ التَّجَمُّلِ وَ الْمُرُوءَةِ
titles.en: The Book of Outfits and the Beautification and the Magnanimity
Chapter 25 – The Yemeni Onyx and the Crystals

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (22/360)

parts.text: مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ بْنِ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ

narrator_chain.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَلِيٍّ عَنْ عُبَيْدِ بْنِ يَحْيَى عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ بْنِ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنْ جَدِّهِ قَالَ

text: قَالَ أَمِيرُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ ( عليه السلام ) تَخَتَّمُوا بِالْجَزْعِ الْيَمَانِيِّ فَإِنَّهُ يَرُدُّ كَيْدَ مَرَدَةِ الشَّيَاطِينِ .

en.hubeali: A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Abu Abdullah, from Muhammad Bin Ali, from Ubeyd Bin Yahya, from Muhammad Bin Al Husayn Bin Ali Bin Al Husayn, from his father, from his grandfather who said,
‘Amir Al-Momineen<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘You should be wearing rings with the Yemeni onyx for it repels the plots of the Accursed satans<sup>la</sup>’.
en.sarwar: 1. A number of our people have narrated from Ahmad ibn abu ‘Abd Allah from Muhammad ibn Ali from ‘Ubayd ibn Yahya from Muhammad ibn al-Husayn ibn Ali ibn al-Husayn from his father from his grandfather has said the following: “’Amir al-Mu’minin, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said, ‘Use Yemenite carnelian as the ring; it dispels plots, the evil plans of defiant Satans.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مجهول - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (2/360)

parts.text: عَلِيِّ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ الْمَعْرُوفِ بِابْنِ وَهْبَةَ الْعَبْدَسِيِّ
هِيَ قَرْيَةٌ مِنْ قُرَى وَاسِطٍ يَرْفَعُهُ

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ أَحْمَدَ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الرَّيَّانِ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ الْمَعْرُوفِ بِابْنِ وَهْبَةَ الْعَبْدَسِيِّ وَ هِيَ قَرْيَةٌ مِنْ قُرَى وَاسِطٍ يَرْفَعُهُ إِلَى أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Muhammad Bin Ahmad, from Ali Bin Al Rayyan, from Ali Bin Muhammad well known as Ibn Wahba Al Abdasy, and it is a town from the towns of Wasit,
(It has been narrated) raising it to Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said, The best of the stones (for rings) is the crystal’.
en.sarwar: 2. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from Ali ibn al-Rayyan from Ali ibn Muhammad known as ibn Wahbah al-‘Abdasiy which is a town in Wasit in a marfu‘ manner has said the following: “Abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said, ‘Al-Billur (crystal) is very good for the stone of a ring.”’
